page.title: 08FESTIVAL OF EID
page.content: In the morning we eat noodles in milk while the men go to the mosque and pray. Each person in the family gives 80p for the people in Pakistan. Then we put on our clothes and wait for the men to come home. We have a dinner of Rice and Curry. Then the ladies cook the evening meal of rice, chapatti, Pila rice with lamb stock, peas coftai and meat balls in a curry sauce. Coloured rice, you make white rice and make a syrup out of sugar and butter when you put it in the oven you add a drop of red, yellow and green food colouring. In the afternoon I eat ludoo brafy and jallabia as an afternoon sweet and then we go to grandma's and grandad's, we say Eid Mubark to them. If anybody we don't know comes to the door we give them some of everything cooked in the house. We eat the evening meal.
